content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ApplicationGroup2 (
     AddedOn DATETIME2, 
     Sour1From VARCHAR(MAX), 
     Sour1To VARCHAR(MAX),
     Target1 VARCHAR(MAX),
     ValidFrom DATETIME2
) WITH (
         DATA_SOURCE = myStagingContainer,
         LOCATION = 'ApplicationGroup2_KEDE/Processed/*.parquet',
         FILE_FORMAT = myParquetFormat
);
